data.lyric:
[ti:Happy Anywhere (feat. Gwen Stefani)]
[ar:Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani]
[al:Happy Anywhere (feat. Gwen Stefani)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.47]Happy Anywhere (feat. Gwen Stefani) - Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani
[00:02.75]Lyrics by：Josh Osborne/Matt Jenkins/Ross Copperman
[00:04.85]Blake Shelton：
[00:12.25]I've always been a rollin' stone
[00:15.87]With a reckless streak
[00:17.97]Yeah the grass never gets too grown
[00:21.50]Underneath my feet
[00:23.67]The city lights Southern stars
[00:26.42]No such thing's gone too far
[00:28.93]Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani：
[00:29.68]I'm running wide open
[00:32.36]I was born with my feet in motion
[00:35.09]But since I met you I swear
[00:38.00]I could be happy anywhere
[00:41.13]Any mapped out location
[00:43.84]You're always my destination
[00:46.86]You're the only thing that I'm chained to
[00:49.46]I could be happy anywhere
[00:52.33]I could be happy anywhere with you
[01:01.42]Yeah the beauty of the northern lights
[01:04.96]And my mind is faded
[01:07.10]The blue sky over Telluride
[01:10.10]Next to you's kinda overrated
[01:12.70]The winding road let it twist
[01:15.47]My home's wherever your heart is
[01:18.69]I'm running wide open
[01:21.53]I was born with my feet in motion
[01:24.30]But since I met you I swear
[01:27.07]I could be happy anywhere
[01:30.25]Any mapped out location
[01:33.13]You're always my destination
[01:35.92]You're the the only thing that I'm chained to
[01:38.59]I could be happy anywhere
[01:41.45]I could be happy anywhere with you
[01:44.71]Gwen Stefani：
[01:45.33]Hey
[01:48.07]Hey
[01:50.44]Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani：
[01:56.34]So girl I hope you know
[01:59.15]Wherever you go I go I know
[02:03.62]I'm running wide open
[02:06.53]I was born with my feet in motion
[02:09.11]But since I met you I swear
[02:11.93]I could be happy anywhere
[02:15.10]Any mapped out location
[02:17.82]You're always my destination
[02:20.79]You're the only thing that I'm chained to
[02:23.36]I could be happy anywhere
[02:26.30]I could be happy anywhere with you
[02:32.74]I could be happy anywhere with you
data.trans:
﻿[ti:Happy Anywhere (feat. Gwen Stefani)]
[ar:Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani]
[al:Happy Anywhere (feat. Gwen Stefani)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.47]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.75]//
[00:04.85]//
[00:12.25]我一直都漂泊无依
[00:15.87]不计后果 疯狂奔跑
[00:17.97]在我脚下的青草
[00:21.50]似乎从不长高
[00:23.67]城里的绚烂灯火 闪烁的南方群星
[00:26.42]这样的美好事物总是转瞬即逝
[00:28.93]//
[00:29.68]我恣意奔跑
[00:32.36]我生来就是为了尽情奔跑
[00:35.09]可自从我遇见了你 我发誓
[00:38.00]无论何处 我可以过得幸福快乐
[00:41.13]无论世上的任何一个角落
[00:43.84]你永远是我的目的地
[00:46.86]只有你让我牵肠挂肚
[00:49.46]无论何处 我可以过得幸福快乐
[00:52.33]与你一起 我无论在哪里都过得幸福快乐
[01:01.42]北极光无与伦比的美
[01:04.96]我思绪模糊
[01:07.10]特莱瑞德湛蓝的天空
[01:10.10]在你身边 让我喜出望外
[01:12.70]任由前路蜿蜒曲折
[01:15.47]你的心就是我的家
[01:18.69]我恣意奔跑
[01:21.53]我生来就是为了尽情奔跑
[01:24.30]可自从我遇见了你 我发誓
[01:27.07]无论何处 我可以过得幸福快乐
[01:30.25]无论世上的任何一个角落
[01:33.13]你永远是我的目的地
[01:35.92]只有你让我牵肠挂肚
[01:38.59]无论何处 我可以过得幸福快乐
[01:41.45]与你一起 我无论在哪里都过得幸福快乐
[01:44.71]//
[01:45.33]//
[01:48.07]//
[01:50.44]//
[01:56.34]所以 女孩 我希望你知道
[01:59.15]我愿能追随你到天涯海角 我心知肚明
[02:03.62]我恣意奔跑
[02:06.53]我生来就是为了尽情奔跑
[02:09.11]可自从我遇见了你 我发誓
[02:11.93]无论何处 我可以过得幸福快乐
[02:15.10]无论世上的任何一个角落
[02:17.82]你永远是我的目的地
[02:20.79]只有你让我牵肠挂肚
[02:23.36]无论何处 我可以过得幸福快乐
[02:26.30]与你一起 我无论在哪里都过得幸福快乐
[02:32.74]与你一起 我无论在哪里都过得幸福快乐
[02:36.64]
